name: Bricks In The Box
description: Bricks In The Box is an arcade game inspired by the breakout title, in contrast to the classic version, the game takes place on boards of various shapes - hexagon, triangle, pentagon - the slat and hole is in the middle of the level. The player's task is to break down as many boxes as possible and to beat his own and global records.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 150 MB available space
